At about 4.5 minutes into the movie, it is said that gravity causes the stars to form. This contradicts observations and established scientific experiments. As Hannes Alfven predicted long ago (without the advanced technology of today), stars are formed by powerful scavenging of matter along magnetically-pinched Birkeland currents inside molecular clouds. This has been captured by Herschel and Spitzer: gas and dust is efficiently scavenged over many light years toward the current filament. Natural electrical processes can explain the observations, and the electric force is infinitely stronger than gravity. Also, plasma discharge events in laboratories are commonly known to generate high-energy light (X-rays, UV light, and even gamma rays) like we see in lightning, quasars, and nebula.
For True Science See Thunderbolts.info, holoscience.info, The Electric Universe Theory, SuspisciousObservers.org and Safire Project.
